summary: Just a rain texture that is more in line with what I like.
descriptionHtml:
Attention: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL THIS BE UPLOADED TO STEAM WORKSHOP AND NO ONE REQUESTING PERMISSION TO DO SO WILL RECEIVE IT. THIS STATEMENT OVERRIDES ANYTHING IN THE PERMISSIONS POPUP THAT IS AVAILABLE ON NEXUS THAT CONFLICTS WITH THIS STATEMENT.

I didn\'t really like the rain in the vanilla game, so I altered the texture. This one is 4x larger than vanilla (but still has a very small filesize). It allowed me to do a few extra things to it that just make it look better in the game than if it were smaller. Hope you enjoy!

If you like, check out my other files!

Dragon Reskins: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9888
Dragon Auras: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9815 
Orcish armor color fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10720 
Snow Retex: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11063
author: Sepherose
